to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: Dai Ashi is a great exercise in Aikido to learn how to defend against multiple attackers.
sentences.chinese: 阿戴是一个很好的锻炼学习合气道如何抵御多种攻击。

sentences.english: In Aikido martial arts Shomen Uchi is an overhead strike defense.
sentences.chinese: 在合气道武术Shomen宇智是国防开销罢工。

sentences.english: Changing the line of attack an attacker is crucial in advanced Aikido.
sentences.chinese: 更改攻击线攻击者是至关重要的先进合气道。

sentences.english: All those, you see, like, Aikido, Korean Karate, and on.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些，你明白，像合气道，朝鲜的空手道等等。

definition: Jeet Kun Do or Way of the Intercepting Fist, a fusion of Eastern and Western martial arts led by Bruce Lee 李小龍|李小龙[Li3 Xiao3 long2]
Ba Ji Quan "Eight Extremes Fist" - Martial Art

military skill or technique (in former times)/all kinds of martial art sports (some claiming spiritual development)/self-defense/tradition of choreographed fights from opera and film (recent usage)/also called kungfu 功夫/CL:種|种[zhong3]
Wing Chun/same as 詠春拳|咏春拳[yong3 chun1 quan2]/Yongchun - "Singing Spring Fist" (Chinese martial art)
